Animation Examples

Functionality Overview

Piskel is a free online editor for animated sprites & pixel art.
You can create amazing pictures and save it as .gif and .apng files. Also you can choose the size of your canvas and the size of its saving.
There are six main tools (pen with 4 sizes, bucket, one-color bucket, line painter, eraser and color-picker).

This application supports user authorization and saves the user session to local storage.

Information about the author
